customRatingsInfo: Gwiritsani ntchito koma kulekanitsa mayina a mavoti, chiwerengero cha mavoti (pamwamba 5) ndi emoji. Sungani mayina a mavoti kuti asapitirire zilembo 20 kuti aziwonetsedwa pa mafoni. Chitsanzo: Zatsopano,5,💡,Kukwaniritsa,5,🔨,Kukondedwa,5,⭐

recommendationToastInfo: Kanikizani mwachangu kapena swipani kumanzere kuwona malangizo a zolemba za gulu lino.
structuredQuestionsInfo: Gwiritsani ntchito comma kulekanitsa mafunso ndi kutalika kwa zilembo zambiri. Sungani mafunso kuti asapitirire zilembo 32 kuti aziwonetsedwa pa mafoni. Chitsanzo: Funso 1,200,Funso 2,600,Funso 3,600

creator: Wolenga
shouldAutoTranslateInfo: Tsambali limaphatikizapo zilankhulo zoposa imodzi, mukufuna kutsegula kutanthauzira kokha?
speechToTextInfo: Tidzayesetsa kutembenuza mawu anu kukhala malemba mwachindunji. Kuti izi zitheke bwino, ndikofunikira kukhazikitsa chilankhulo cha mawonekedwe anu (menu yapamwamba kumanzere) kukhala chofanana ndi chilankhulo chimene mukulankhula ndikulankhula momveka bwino.

pointAudioInfo: Lankhulani momveka bwino. Kutalika kwakukulu kwa audio ndi
pointAudioInfoAndroid: Pa Android gwiritsani ntchito kanema kujambula, mawu okha azagwiritsidwa ntchito.

removalAndDeletionInProgress: Kuchotsa ndi kufufuta kuli patsogolo. Yesani kutsitsa tsambalo patapita kanthawi.
removalsAndDeletionsInProgress: Kuchotsa ndi kufufuta kuli patsogolo koma kungatenge nthawi kutengera chiwerengero cha ogwiritsa ntchito omwe akhudzidwa. Yesani kutsitsa tsambalo patapita kanthawi.

areYouSureRemoveAndDeleteUser: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa wogwiritsa ntchitoyu ndi kufufuta zonse zomwe ali nazo?
areYouSureRemoveUser: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa wogwiritsa ntchitoyu?

removeSelectedAndDeleteContent: Chotsani ogwiritsa ntchito ndi kufufuta zonse:
emailAlreadyRegisterred: Simungathe kusintha imelo yanu pa adilesi iyi popeza ilipo kale.
cantDisconnectFromFacebookWithoutValidEm: Simungathe kulekanitsa kuchokera ku Facebook Login popanda adilesi yolondola ya imelo
cantDisconnectFromSamlWithoutValidEmail: Simungathe kulekanitsa kuchokera ku Electronic ID login popanda imelo yolondola
disconnectedSamlLoginFor: Mwalekanitsidwa kuchokera ku Electronic ID pa
areYouSureYouWantToDisconnectSamlLogin: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kulekanitsa akaunti yanu kuchokera ku Electronic ID Login? Simudzatha kulowa ndi ID yanu ya electronic pambuyo pa ntchitoyi!
areYouSureYouWantToDisconnectFacebookLog: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kulekanitsa akaunti yanu kuchokera ku Facebook Login? Simudzatha kulowa ndi Facebook pambuyo pa ntchitoyi!
hidePostFilterAndSearch: Bisani fyuluta ya positi ndi kusaka
forceSecureSamlLoginInfo: Kuti mulowe gulu ili muyenera kulowa ndi chizindikiritso cha electronic chotetezeka kuti mutsimikizire voti imodzi pa munthu. Dinani pansipa kuti mulowe.
areYouSureYouWantToAnonymizeUser: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kusintha akaunti yanu kukhala yosadziwika?
areYouReallySureYouWantToAnonymizeUser: Mukutsimikiza 100% kuti mukufuna kusintha akaunti yanu kukhala yosadziwika? Ma positi anu onse, mfundo, ndemanga ndi kuvomereza kudzasinthidwa kukhala osadziwika
anonymizeUserInfo: Mukasintha akaunti yanu kukhala yosadziwika, ma positi anu onse, mfundo ndi mavoti adzasinthidwa kukhala osadziwika ndipo sadzatha kutsatiridwa kubwerera kwa inu.
deleteUserInfo: Mukachotsa akaunti yanu, zolemba zanu zonse, mfundo ndi mavoti zidzachotsedwa kosatha ndipo sipadzakhala njira iliyonse yobwezeretsa deta. Ngati mwakhazikitsa madera kapena magulu ndiye adzasinthidwa kukhala osadziwika.
deleteOrAnonymizeUser: Chotsani kapena Sinthani Akaunti Kukhala Osadziwika

communityDeleteConfirmation: CHENJEZO! Ngati mufufuta gulu lonse, mapositi ake onse ndi mfundo za mikangano zidzafufutidwa. Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kupitiliza?

Name: Dzina
Your idea has been added, you can contin: Malingaliro anu awonjezedwa, mutha kupitiriza kuvota.
New ideas will be reviewed for originali: Lingaliro lanu lili m'ndondomeko ya kuyang'anira.
flaggedIdea: Lingaliro lanu lati likanidwa chifukwa chosayenera. Chonde yesaninso.
ideaAdded: Lingaliro lanu lawonjezedwa, mutha kupitiriza kuvota.
ideaModerationQueue: Lingaliro lanu lili m'ndondomeko ya kuyang'anira.
yourIdeaHasBeenAdded: Lingaliro lanu lawonjezedwa, likupanga chithunzi cha icon.
aiIconInfo: Chizindikiro cha yankho lanu chikupangidwa, mutha kutseka zenera kapena kudikira kuti chizindikirocho chipangidwe. Mudzakhalanso ndi mwayi wopanga chizindikirocho kachiwiri.
aboutGroupPrivacyOptionsCreateGroupDirec: Pagulu zikutanthauza kuti aliyense ali ndi ulalo atha kupeza. Payekha zikutanthauza kuti mwaliko (ndi imelo) ndipo ogwiritsa ntchito omwe amapanga akaunti ndi ulalo wamwaliko okha ndi omwe angapeze.
aboutGroupPrivacyOptions: Mukamagwiritsa ntchito magulu otseguka kwa anthu, ndiye kuti anthuwo amayang'anira ngati ndi pagulu kapena payekha. Magulu apayekha ndi mwaliko (ndi imelo) okha ndipo ogwiritsa ntchito omwe amapanga akaunti ndi ulalo wamwaliko okha ndi omwe angathe kuchita.
aboutStatusOptions: Zowonetsedwa, Zogwira ntchito & Zosungidwa zimayang'anira malo amagulu m'gulu. Magulu obisika sakuwonetsedwa m'mndandanda wa madera ndipo amabisidwa kuchokera kuma injini osakira momwe zingathere.
aboutStatusOptionsCreateGroupDirectly: Magulu obisika sakuwonetsedwa m'mndandanda wa madera ndipo amabisidwa kuchokera kuma injini osakira momwe zingathere.
enableAiModeration: Lolani Kuyang'anira kwa AI Yokha (onani chilengezo cha kuyang'anira pansipa)
allowAnswersNotForVoting: Mayankho omwe ogwiritsa ntchito apereka sangavoteredwe
confirmDeleteLogoImage: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa chithunzi cha logo?
confirmDeleteVideo: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa kanema uyu?
rankedOrderInfo: Izi ndi mayankho omwe adalembedwa malinga ndi kuvota kwa anthu
aiAnalysisInfo: Izi ndi zotsatira zokha zopangidwa ndi kusanthula mayankho ndi mavoti ndi GPT-4
socialMediaCreateInfo: Dzina, kufotokozera ndi chithunzi cha logo zidzagwiritsidwa ntchito pogawana pa malo ochezera a pa Intaneti
generateAnswersInfo: Mafunso amafuna osachepera zilembo 3. Perekani mayankho osachepera 6 pansipa, limodzi pa mzere uliwonse, ndi malire a zilembo 140 aliyense.
aiAnalysisConfigInfo:
AI yodziwikiratu imagwiritsa ntchito zopempha za LLM kuti ipatse ovota kusanthula kwa mayankho apamwamba ndi otsika. Mwachisawawa, dongosololi limakhazikitsidwa kuti lisanthule zabwino ndi zoyipa za mayankho atatu apamwamba ndi atatu otsika. Mutha kuletsa kusanthula pamwambapa. Nayi mtundu wa deta:

]
}
]
newIdeasNotAllowedForVotingInfo: (*) Kafukufukuyu sakuwonetsa malingaliro omwe adaperekedwa ndi ogwiritsa ntchito.
aoiModerationPrompt: Malangizo a AI Moderation (kwa mtundu wa LLM)
minimumTenVotesInfo: Mayankho adzaonetsedwa pano pokhapokha atalandira mavoti osachepera khumi.
minimumTenVotesToShowResults: Mavoti ochepa khumi kuti awonetsedwe mu zotsatira
allowAnonymousUsersToVote: Lolani wogwiritsa ntchito kuponya popanda akaunti yolowera
loginToAddCommentOrLink: Lowani kuti muwonjezere ndemanga kapena kulumikizana
